title: Suggestions for web3 are shown if type any letter, number or most of symbols (e.g. Abcd)
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: 
* In 0.9.6 release, suggestions for web3 are shown only if type letter W/w. 
* Currently, if type any letter, number or symbols (except / @) then web3 suggestions are shown. This happens if in console web3 suggestions were shown at least once. 
![suggestions on any letter](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6584810/25590621/93ac4052-2eb1-11e7-88a7-389d73a2a48e.png)
* In addition, if proceed typing non existing command, e.g. "web3.aaaabbbbb" then suggestions stay opened. In 0.9.6 as soon as you type non-existing command suggestions are hidden.
![command and suggestions](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6584810/25590917/a72d3784-2eb2-11e7-8559-fd68f96fe293.png)

 
#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
As in previous version: 
1. Suggestions for web3 are shown only if start typing letter W/w. If type C/c then console suggestions are show. If type any other letter,number then suggestions are not shown. 
2. As soon as extra text typed after "web3." that is not part of existing command -> suggestions are hidden
#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
1. if type any letter, number or symbols (except / @) then web3 suggestions are shown.
2. if type non-existing command, e.g web3.aaaabbbb then suggestions stay opened
### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)
video: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0Bz3t9zSg1wb7Q0psaFpEcGc2R0U
- Open Status
- Open console
- type w -> web3 suggestions are shown (Note: it's important step. You need to trigger web3 suggestions and than next steps will produce issue)
- delete w
- type "abcd" -> currently, suggestions are shown
- delete "abcd"
- type web3.aaabbb -> suggestions are shown


### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: 0.9.7d34
* Operating System: Android and iOS
